title: Melange Lab
description: What started as a journey of a group of dynamic researchers working on Mobile and Ubiquitous Computing (MUC) in 2009 has now got an identity as Mélange– a diverse cadre working in areas like Public Health & Education(both rural and urban settings), Energy Sustainability, Mobile Cloud Sensing etc. With passing years we transformed our vision towards Human Computer Interaction (HCI) with the objective of sustainable development.
